meta.name: Good Morning America
meta.description: Good Morning America is a two-hour, live program anchored by Robin Roberts, George Stephanopoulos and Michael Strahan. Lara Spencer is the entertainmnt anchor, and Ginger Zee is the chief meteorologist.

videos.title: Samuel Arnold, Bruno Gouery
videos.overview: Actors Samuel Arnold and Bruno Gouery ("Emily in Paris"); Lori's Trend Lab: Holiday Hosting with "GMA" lifestyle contributor Lori Bergamotto; Deals & Steals: Holiday Gifting with ABC e-commerce editor Tory Johnson.

videos.title: Monday, April 18
videos.overview: "GMA" will hold a live town hall discussion with Republican Presidential Candidate Ted Cruz ahead of Tuesday's New York Primary; Senator Cruz will be joined by his wife, Heidi, for a portion of the discussion; George Stephanopoulos and Robin Roberts will moderate, and Cruz will address questions from voters in the audience, via remote across the country and on social media

videos.title: Tuesday, April 19
videos.overview: Actors Johnny Knoxville, Alex Pettyfer and Colin Hanks ("Elvis & Nixon"); the couple voted off last night's "Dancing with the Stars"; Jesse Palmer reports from Orlando on all the exciting new attractions Disney is offering this summer – from Star Wars to Frozen to Animal Kingdom after dark; "Passion for Profit": GMA celebrates the young entrepreneurs who have pursued their dreams and made big profits doing something they love, with advice from "Shark Tank" host Barbara Corcoran

videos.title: Wednesday, April 20
videos.overview: Actress Brooke Burke-Charvet discusses her new book, "Chicken Soup for the Soul: the Joy of Less," with Amy Newmark and provides tips on how to de-clutter our lives; an interview with the actors of HBO's "Game of Thrones"; editorial director Jess Cagle reveals People Magazine's Most Beautiful People issue; "Passion to Profit" week continues: the young fashion entrepreneurs who are rising stars in the business world, with advice from fashion designer Rebecca Minkoff

videos.title: Thursday, April 21
videos.overview: An interview with the actresses of "Game of Thrones"; "Deals and Steals" with contributor Tory Johnson; "Passion for Profit" continues with young entrepreneurs who are rising stars in the business world

videos.title: Friday, April 22
videos.overview: Actors Kevin Spacey and Michael Shannon ("Elvis & Nixon"); actor Nikolaj Coster-Waldau ("Game of Thrones"); chef and television personality Aaron Sanchez

videos.title: Monday, April 25
videos.overview: An interview with the actresses of "Game of Thrones"; a performance by singer and songwriter Maren Morris; Martha Stewart Weddings Editor Darcy Miller with the latest wedding dress trends; "Passion for Profit" continues with young entrepreneurs who are rising stars in the business world.

videos.title: Tuesday, April 26
videos.overview: Entrepreneur and philanthropist Phil Knight on his new memoir ("Shoe Dog"); food blogger Andie Mitchell ("Cook Yourself Slim"); "The Knot" Editor in Chief Kellie Gould with popular flower girl fashions; the couple voted off last night's "Dancing with the Stars"; "GMA"'s Infertility Series: one woman's journey freezing her eggs.

videos.title: Wednesday, April 27
videos.overview: Actor Robert Downey, Jr. ("Captain America: Civil War"); Good Housekeeping's Lori Bergamotto discusses popular wedding trends; UFC Takeover; "GMA"'s Infertility series continues with people who are crowdsourcing their ability to have children in the future.

videos.title: Thursday, April 28
videos.overview: Actresses Susan Sarandon and Geena Davis ("25th Anniversary: Thelma & Louise"); "Deals and Steals" with contributor Tory Johnson; "GMA"'s Epic Wedding Event kicks off as 100 couples get married across America and across the globe in 24 hours; "GMA"'s Infertility series continues: the latest in new packaged fertility testing

videos.title: Friday, April 29
videos.overview: Actors Jennifer Aniston and Jason Sudeikis ("Mother's Day"); "GMA"'s Epic Wedding Event concludes as 16 couples get married live in Times Square; a performance by Boyz II Men.

videos.title: Monday, May 9
videos.overview: Robin Roberts sits down with Prince Harry and First Lady Michelle Obama for an exclusive interview in Orlando at the 2016 Invictus Games; a performance by country singer Cole Swindell; the quintuplets in TLC's new series "OutDaughtered"; "GMA"'s The Skin You're In series: New info about skin cancer and how to protect yourself; one couple's journey visiting all the US national parks

videos.title: Tuesday, May 10
videos.overview: "GMA" is live from Gunnison National Park in Colorado; a performance by the pop band Lukas Graham; the couple voted off last night's "Dancing with the Stars"; television personality John Walsh and his son Callahan on raising awareness for missing children; a look at the cutting edge surgery that allows you to throw away your reading glasses

videos.title: Wednesday, May 11

videos.title: Thursday, May 12

videos.title: Monday, May 16

videos.title: Tuesday, May 17

videos.title: Thursday, May 19

videos.title: Monday, May 23

videos.title: Wednesday, May 25
videos.overview: "GMA" rolls out the red carpet for the final three "Dancing with the Stars" couples following last night's season finale, with exclusive live interviews with the couples and questions from viewers; plus the finalists dazzle the audience with one more dance; singer and songwriter Pink on her single for "Alice Through the Looking Glass."

videos.title: Friday, May 27

videos.title: Episode 152
videos.overview: Co-anchors report the morning's top headlines from a set in Times Square. The show features a combination of breaking news, interviews, in-depth reporting and weather. The program covers important issues with key figures from around the world and a wide spectrum of topics, including medicine, finance, consumer issues, computer technology, education and gardening.
